doc.after: The New Zealand Police is the primary law enforcement agency of New Zealand including the South Island Three decentralised Police Districts cover the entire South Island with each being commanded by a Superintendent and having a central station from which subsidiary and suburban stations are managed 44 The Christchurch Police Communications Centre handles all emergency and general calls within the South Island
